Meta & Instagram Shop Growth Specialist

Posted: 2025-10-18

Expires: 2025-11-01

Active
Meta & Instagram Shop Growth Specialist (Ecommerce – US Market) We are an established and growing Private Label (PL) ecommerce brand selling on Amazon, Walmart, TikTok, Temu, Target, and other marketplaces. We’re now expanding into Meta (Facebook & Instagram Shops) and looking for a creative and experienced specialist to take full ownership of setting up, managing, and growing our shop presence — specifically for the US market. Responsibilities: You will oversee everything from shop setup, catalog management, and product listings to paid ads, organic growth, customer queries, and coordination with internal teams. Working closely with our in-house design team, you’ll plan campaigns, optimize listings, and drive brand growth across Meta platforms. This role demands both creative thinking and analytical skills to boost traffic, engagement, and sales. What We’re Looking For: Proven experience in launching and growing Meta/Instagram Shops for international (preferably US) ecommerce brands. Strong understanding of Meta Ads, product listing optimization, and social commerce. Background in home textile or apparel niche is highly preferred. Creative mindset with excellent coordination and communication skills. Work Details: 📍 Fully Remote Opportunity (Pakistan) 🗓 Working Days: Monday to Friday ⏰ Timings: Q4 (Oct-Dec): 4:30 PM – 1:00 AM (PKT) Q1–Q3 (Jan-Sep): 3:30 PM – 12:00 AM (PKT) If you’ve successfully managed and scaled ecommerce stores on Meta and Instagram and want to be part of a growing international brand — we’d love to hear from you! 📩 Interested candidates can share their CVs at: hr@luxdecorcollection.com
📍 Remote#Meta & Instagram Shop Growth Specialist🧳 Experienced Required

Junior React Native Developer

Posted: 2025-10-18

Expires: 2025-11-01

Active
🔹 We’re Hiring Junior React Native Developer We are seeking a Junior React Native Developer to join our dynamic and fast-growing team. This role is ideal for individuals looking to begin or advance their career in mobile application development within a professional and growth-oriented environment. Position: Junior React Native Developer Experience: 3 – 6 months (Fresh graduates with strong fundamentals are encouraged to apply) Location: Islamabad / Remote (as applicable) Employment Type: Full-time / Internship Key Responsibilities: Assist in the development and maintenance of mobile applications using React Native. Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and deliver new features. Write clean, efficient, and reusable code following best practices. Participate in code reviews and contribute to continuous improvement. Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in mobile development. Requirements: Solid understanding of React Native and JavaScript (ES6+). Familiarity with REST APIs and mobile app architecture. Basic knowledge of version control systems (Git). Strong problem-solving, debugging, and communication skills. A proactive attitude with a desire to learn and grow. What We Offer: A professional learning environment with mentorship and career guidance. Exposure to real-world projects and modern development workflows. Opportunities for long-term collaboration and career growth. Supportive, team-oriented culture focused on innovation and excellence. 📩 How to Apply: Interested candidates are invited to send their CV or portfolio to hr@devxcel.tech with the subject line: “Application – Junior React Native Developer”
📍 Islamabad📍 Remote#Junior React Native Developer🧳 Fresh Required
